static_commands.about:
The One Hour Game Jam occurs every Saturday at 20:00 UTC and ends at 21:00 UTC. You have until the next jam to submit your game.
Join us, learn and have fun!
static_commands.vote: Vote on the next theme here: https://onehourgamejam.com/?page=themes *if you don't have an account yet, type __!login__*
static_commands.submit: Submit your game here: https://onehourgamejam.com/?page=submit *if you don't have an account yet, type __!login__*
static_commands.login: If you don't have an account yet or if you haven't logged in go here: https://onehourgamejam.com/?page=login
